title: 英國i news記者: 藍韜文證實英國計劃給予290萬BNO持有人享有居留權

replies.msg:
Dominic Raab confirms that UK is proposing to offer residency rights to 2.9m people from Hong Kong

but adds: "You're not going to get all of those people, a fraction of them would actually come to the UK."

Dominic Raab確認英國將計劃向香港的290萬BNO持有人提供居留權

但他補充說：“這並不會吸引所有人，實際上只有其中一小部分人會來到英國。”

replies.msg:
首先搞清楚一個概念
Grammar上BNO拎走括號同形容詞之後 最關鍵嗰個字係National 英文入面BNO係講緊啲人
法律上BNO係一個身份
而香港人平時喺香港語入面用｢BNO｣來指代｢註明持有人嘅國籍係BNO嘅護照｣呢個用法喺英文入面係無嘅

同瓷國話即使無拎過特衰護照你都係瓷籍嘅原理一樣
祇不過BNO特別在首次獲得BNO身份(首次成為BNO)嗰時，手續上必然會拎到第一本BNO護照(自己名/父母名護照入面嘅included child)
有無拎住有效嘅BNO護照係唔會影響BNO身份

Compare BDTC
一出世就係BDTC嘅話
出世紙有一欄會寫住ESTABLISHED
即使無拎過護照
嗰張出世紙就已經足以證明你(發出出世紙當時)係BDTC

有D人仲話畀全港七百萬人有居英權，即係唔係話D咩，人地點都會優先考慮BNO 先囉，起碼同英國政府有關係，九七後無BNO無BC個班難聽D講已經同英國政府無關係，唔見得英國政府有咩特別理由要畀佢地，最多只係會畀難民庇護畀佢地同佢地屋企人，呢個唔單止有得filter d同英國政府無關係既藍絲同廢老，更加最重要既係難民庇護已經幫英國閘到好多香港人唔畀佢地入黎英國住之餘仲唔會太過刺激到支共

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-britain-eu-immigration/uk-heralds-end-of-cheap-labor-from-europe-with-post-brexit-immigration-system-idUSKBN20C2OB

It will mark a sea change for businesses who have grown used to having access to a large pool of EU workers, particularly since 2004 when the accession of several former communist states in central and eastern Europe saw a big influx of migrants coming to Britain to work.

“We have got a number of routes through the points-based immigration scheme that will enable people to come here with the right kind of skills that can support our country and our economy,” interior minister Priti Patel said.

LOWER SALARY THRESHOLD
The Home Office said it would follow a recommendation made last month by the Migration Advisory Committee (MAC), an independent body which advises the government, to lower the minimum general salary threshold for skilled migrants to 25,600 pounds ($33,330) a year, from 30,000 pounds.

Skilled workers will need to meet criteria including the ability to speak English and will need to have a job offer.

The MAC estimated the impact of the government’s planned salary and skills thresholds would mean around 70% of European Economic Area citizens who have arrived in Britain since 2004 would not have been eligible for a visa.

There will be no specific entry route for low-skilled workers, something the government hopes will help reduce migrant numbers.

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-britain-eu-immigration/uk-heralds-end-of-cheap-labor-from-europe-with-post-brexit-immigration-system-idUSKBN20C2OB

It will mark a sea change for businesses who have grown used to having access to a large pool of EU workers, particularly since 2004 when the accession of several former communist states in central and eastern Europe saw a big influx of migrants coming to Britain to work.

“We have got a number of routes through the points-based immigration scheme that will enable people to come here with the right kind of skills that can support our country and our economy,” interior minister Priti Patel said.

LOWER SALARY THRESHOLD
The Home Office said it would follow a recommendation made last month by the Migration Advisory Committee (MAC), an independent body which advises the government, to lower the minimum general salary threshold for skilled migrants to 25,600 pounds ($33,330) a year, from 30,000 pounds.

Skilled workers will need to meet criteria including the ability to speak English and will need to have a job offer.

The MAC estimated the impact of the government’s planned salary and skills thresholds would mean around 70% of European Economic Area citizens who have arrived in Britain since 2004 would not have been eligible for a visa.

There will be no specific entry route for low-skilled workers, something the government hopes will help reduce migrant numbers.

比 Council tax only

中 小學 學費全免

小朋友仲唔使一定要上興趣班

如果有一技之長 （三行/修理）

根本冇生活壓力

不過一定要買醫療保險

你條數係講緊真係要賣哂香港d 野
但係以manchester 為例，average annual salary 係33-38k，即係~400k hkd，但係交稅都交左成半，即係200k hkd 一年
除番就算你話樓價車價平過香港好多都好，其實都真係得17k hkd左右一個月洗，你自己諗下夠唔夠

首先搞清楚一個概念
Grammar上BNO拎走括號同形容詞之後 最關鍵嗰個字係National 英文入面BNO係講緊啲人
法律上BNO係一個身份
而香港人平時喺香港語入面用｢BNO｣來指代｢註明持有人嘅國籍係BNO嘅護照｣呢個用法喺英文入面係無嘅

同瓷國話即使無拎過特衰護照你都係瓷籍嘅原理一樣
祇不過BNO特別在首次獲得BNO身份(首次成為BNO)嗰時，手續上必然會拎到第一本BNO護照(自己名/父母名護照入面嘅included child)
有無拎住有效嘅BNO護照係唔會影響BNO身份

Compare BDTC
一出世就係BDTC嘅話
出世紙有一欄會寫住ESTABLISHED
即使無拎過護照
嗰張出世紙就已經足以證明你(發出出世紙當時)係BDTC

replies.msg:
拎BNO嘅前提係你係BDTC
97年BDTC失效為止，佢可能有或者無拎過護照（國籍寫住係BDTC嘅護照）

但BDTC同BNO係兩個獨立嘅國籍

一個BDTC登記成為BNO嘅時候 手續上會拎到一本BNO護照(or included child)，但佢到97年BDTC失效為止，即使佢無拎過BDTC護照，佢都係BDTC/BNO雙重國籍

根據英國法律所有因為香港嘅BDTC喺97後會失去佢嘅BDTC國籍

如果一個BDTC(HK)喺97前｢無拎BNO護照｣(無登記成為BNO)嘅話，咁佢就變成瓷籍單一國籍
(但而家爭取緊平權方案係包括無拎BNO護照嘅｢前BDTC｣)


如果一個BDTC同時申請居英權計劃拎到BC
咁[97前]佢會係英國/英國/英國三重國籍
(或者英/英/英/瓷四重國籍)

replies.msg:
1. British National (Overseas) 係國籍
British National (Overseas) Passport 係用黎證明持證人有上面提及過嘅身份

2. 登記BN(O)成功，會獲簽發一本BN(O)護照。所以如果從來獲發BN(O)護照，咁你的確從來無BN(O)身份。係1997年12月31日後，無人可以再登記成為BN(O)，即使曾經擁有BDTC-HK身份。

3. 我再講多次 你圈住嗰句，係防止有只憑香港關係取得BDTC又除BDTC外無其他國籍嘅人又無係限期前登記成為BN(O)，中國亦唔認佢做中國公民嘅人，係1997年7月1日成為無國籍人士，所以呢啲人係呢一日起會自動成為British Overseas Citizen，即BOC。

British National (Overseas) (BN(O))同 British Overseas Citizen (BOC) 係兩種完全唔同嘅國籍黎，唔好搞錯。

所以最能夠解釋到點解bno遲遲無居英權一定係外交考量，一開始英政府個出發點係bno平權會違反中英聯合聲明呢個國際條約，收尾就驚bno平權會激嬲中共，呢點藍轁文自己都講左
